channel.title: Tattoos
channel.description:
Post your tattoos! Today got one ive been planning for some time and plan to get a lotus flower around it later on. Om!
[img]http://s29.postimg.org/7zv18kcfb/IMAG1017.jpg[/img]

item.title: Tattoos
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

Thanks, it is a Buddhist enso symbol for enlightenment. I Know I want to get more tattoos just not sure what.

Read full topic

item.title: Tattoos
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

Sleeves, well, tattoos anywhere are just more common these days, all around the world. I myself have never once thought about tattooing my arms - at least not until last, being such an open area I’d have a hard time knowing what I want to be that visible forever. However within 10 years I hope to have most of my torso/legs covered, without throat/arms/head. I do have mates with tattooed necks/heads etc it’s just not what I’m after with tattoos.

Do you have a particular style set in mind Ruby? I’ve got no idea who the stone roses are but interesting to see you’re dedicating (most or all?) of an entire arm to it, I guess that’s fitting for a guitarist too, using your arms and all. Watch out for the trick where people say “Oh yo, can I play guitar on your arm?” and bam, they slap you in the nuts with your own arm. #reallifeexperiences

Also, it isn’t really hideous tribal shit until photos are posted on the internet ;D

@archer That paintbrush swishy flicky thing is cool, any more work planned for those areas?

Read full topic

item.title: Tattoos
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Archer:

Sounds bout right. What are you getting as your right sleeve?

Not sure about the right sleeve, planned my left out so far. Right sleeve I was thinking about something going around like native americans and wolves and shit. I just don’t want stuff that other people have. Sleeves are VERY common over here, everyone has koi carps and lotus flowers and shit, I want something different.

For my left sleeve: I’ve been a guitarist for around about 8 years and I’m a crazy stone roses fanatic so to start it off I’m getting the neck of my custom guitar and lyrics from “I wanna be adored” under it. I’ll then be going with the stone roses lemon, a portrait of Ian Brown, a few pieces from things like their “one love” along with album art etc

Read full topic

item.title: Tattoos
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

Sounds bout right. What are you getting as your right sleeve?

Read full topic

item.title: Tattoos
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Archer:

Why do you say it is bad? Was it just randomly picked from a book in the shop and now don’t like it? And those sleeves are gonna be hella pricey. Did they give you an idea on how much to expect? My guys are around 100-150 an hour and the more advance ones cost more.

It was done incredibly shoddily, it’s patchy, the lines are wonky, it’s just really shit. I’ll see if I can get a decent picture to show you at some point.

The sleeves are pretty expensive, they charge £60 an hour regardless of what work you’re getting done so the more intricate the more time etc. We’re reckoning around about 15-18 hours on the left sleeve and we haven’t even looked at the right sleeve and even then it’s just a very rough estimation. Probably about 1800-2200 GBP all in. (Roughly 2700-3400 USD)

Read full topic

item.title: Tattoos
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I’ve got some hideous tribal shit on my back but I’m booked in for a 4 hours sitting on the 18th of this month to get my first sleeve started.

Basic plans are to get both sleeves done and then have them meet over my back to cover up the absolutely astoundingly bad tribal work. I’ll post a picture once the first piece is done
